tests.name: Base case with a solar PV system
tests.description: House with a 2.5 kWp, south-facing solar PV system. Roof pitch is 30 degrees, overshading is 'modest, PV system is 'connected to the dwellings electricity meter and the dwelling is export capable.

answers.description: The total annual PV generation in kWh. Using the rule of thumb of aroung 700 kWh/year generation for each kWp installed, this looks about right.

tests.name: Base case with a solar PV system - double area
tests.description: House with a 5 kWp, south-facing solar PV system. Roof pitch is 30 degrees, overshading is 'modest, PV system is 'connected to the dwellings electricity meter and the dwelling is export capable.

answers.description: The total annual PV generation in kWh. This is double the answer in '1' which makes sense as the PV array area has doubled.
